nodes.text: The EV motivator was a model of motivator that MerenData intended to install in their EV-series supervisor droid. However, either through negligence or sabotage, an employee sublistituded them with a case of MDF motivators, meant to be installed in torture droids. The affected droids were recalled by MerenData to exchange the motivators.
The EV motivator was first mentioned in The Essential Guide to Droids, a 1999 Star Wars Legends reference book written by Daniel Wallace.
